about_the_game:
Welcome to Sudoban, a delightful fusion of Sudoku and Sokoban that offers a soothing but engaging logic puzzle experience!


Immerse yourself in the world of Sudoban, where your goal is to carefully maneuver numbered blocks around a board in order to fill the designated rows and columns. Move blocks into place by performing active moves, guiding them across the board and pushing other blocks into place along the way. Enjoy the serenity of the game as you solve your way through hand-crafted puzzles, each carefully designed to keep your mind captivated.

Key Features:
  • Immerse yourself in a hand-crafted puzzle collection designed to provide a relaxing yet mentally stimulating experience!
  • Sink into puzzle-solving bliss with a tranquil acoustic finger-style guitar soundtrack!
  • Enjoy a minimalist design with a variety of captivating themes customized to your liking!
  • Take breaks at your leisure and seamlessly pick up where you left off!
  • Fear not the missteps, as you can undo moves to your heart's content!

You're invited to unwind and challenge your mind. Ready to embrace the tranquil joy of logical problem-solving with Sudoban?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space

name: Sudoban

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 70 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a serene puzzle journey with Sudoban, a fresh twist on the beloved logic puzzle! Carefully maneuver numbered blocks to fill rows and columns, solving hand-crafted minimalistic puzzles. Unwind, challenge your mind, and embrace the tranquil joy of logical problem-solving!
